```{r, include=TRUE}
require(terra)
require(sf)
require(tidyverse)
require(geojsonsf)
```

```{r , include=TRUE}
mm_bound <- geojson_sf(r"(1_raw_data\boundaries\National_Trust_Open_Data _Land_-_Always_Open.geojson)") %>%
  st_transform(mm_bound, crs = 27700)
plot(mm_bound)
```

```{r , include=TRUE}
landcover <- rast(r"(1_raw_data\landcover\landcover_25m_grid\data\LCM.tif)")[[1]] #load the first band of the raster
plot(landcover)
```
```{r , include=TRUE}
landcover <- terra::crop(landcover, mm_bound, mask = TRUE)
plot(landcover)
```

```{r , include=TRUE}
landcover_sf <- as.polygons(landcover, dissolve=FALSE) #set dissolve to FALSE to keep all pixels as separate polygons
landcover_sf <- st_as_sf(landcover_sf)
head(landcover_sf)
```
